original: intros. unfold Zp_mult. rewrite Zp_mult_one. symmetry. apply Zp_inj. rewrite rem_prop with (n:=1). - rewrite Nat.mul_1_l. apply rem_lt. + apply Hp. + apply lt_pirr. - rewrite Nat.mul_comm. apply rem_lt. + apply Hp. + apply lt_pirr.
